articles.author: Haresh Menghani
articles.title: Gold pares intraday losses, keeps the red amid modest USD strength ahead of NFP - FXStreet
articles.description: Gold price (XAU/USD) extends the previous day's modest pullback from the record peak and continues losing ground through the Asian session on Friday.
articles.content:
• Gold price corrects further from the all-time high amid hawkish remarks by Fed officials.
  • Some follow-through USD buying exerts some pressure ahead of the crucial US NFP data.
